name: India, 1947 Independence
description: Issued to commemorate India's independence from British rule. A very symbolic piece.

name: UK, 1952 Queen Elizabeth II
description: First definitive stamp series featuring Queen Elizabeth II after her coronation.

name: US, 1921 Silver Dollar
description: Also known as the Morgan Dollar, one of the most collected US coins.

name: India, 1901 Rupee
description: British India Rupee issued during the reign of Edward VII.

name: US, 1950 Liberty Stamp
description: Commemorates liberty and freedom, popular among collectors.
